title: Dye Paint For Leather Shoes And Bags With Sponge And Brush, Kaps Super Color, 70 Colours, 25ml - 0.85 fl. Oz., 118 - Black
features: VERSATILE: High-quality dye for natural leather, faux leather and fabric. Use it on shoes, bags and other leather accessories.

USE: Perfect for fixing and repairing leather damages such as abrasions and scratches on shoes and leather accessories. Can also be used to redye your shoes. Strong dye that restores colour permanently. Wait 24 hours for the dye to dry.
INCLUDED: Comes with a convenient brush and a sponge applicator.
MANUFACTURING: Made in Europe by a family business with decades of experience in shoe care and leather craftsmanship.
CONTENT: 1 bottle contains 25 ml (0.85 fl oz) of dye. Choose your favourite hue from our range of colours. See the product description for how to use instructions.
description: Product Description Kaps Super Color How to touch up scratches and abrasion easily: Scratches and abrasion cause your shoes to look worn and old over time. But with Kaps Super Color we've got you covered! You will be delighted to see your shoes looking as good as new. long-lasting and water-repellent results suitable for leather, faux leather and fabric easy to apply using a sponge or brush and your shoes will look like new after 24 hrs. pack contains 25 ml of dye and made in the EU How to use Stir the bottom of the dye bottle with the brush. The leather must be cleaned of grease and dirt. The product Kaps Conditioner is recommended for natural leather and artificial leather. Let dry. First apply paint with the brush to hard-to-reach areas, such as: B. the joint between the sole and leather or seams. Apply some paint to the sponge with a brush. Gently rub the sponge onto the surface of the shoe to be dyed in a circular motion. Made in the EU Long-lasting For Redyeing and touch-up For smooth and faux leather The video showcases the product in use. The video guides you through product setup. The video compares multiple products. The video shows the product being unpacked. Video Player is loading. Can this dye be used on nubuck and suede shoes? No. For redyeing nubuck and suede shoes, please use Kaps Suede Dye. Can I use this product to redye my canvas trainers? Yes, Super Color can also be used on fabric. How do I take care of my shoes after dyeing them? After dyeing, the upper material may appear somewhat dried out. Just shine the upper with Kaps Delicate Cream polish which is available in a wide range of colours.
